## Example Repository - Belize

Belize's **assessment repository** is **blz**, available on GitHub at https://github.com/OHI-Science/blz.  
  
![github example - Belize](https://docs.google.com/drawings/d/1X0Jqh_BM05EK_UqpbCUVFUdik6YN5HaEqiNWHNPQr9c/pub?w=750&h=720)

## Example Repository - Belize

Within the **subcountry2014** folder are some key files we will work with:

- **layers.csv**: one file that records all data layers
- **layers folder**: contains all data layers
- **conf/functions.r**: contains all the goal model functions
- **conf/goals.csv**: set up how goals are calculated and weighted
- **conf/pressures_matrix.csv**:  pressures and their weights 
- **conf/resilience_matrix.csv**: used for calculating resilience
